item.title: Willful ignorance
item.description: Sun Tzu said: know yourself, know your opponent, and not a single battle you will lose; know yourself, don’t know your opponent, lose one, win one; know neither yourself nor your opponent, every battle you will lose (知彼知己，百战不殆；不知彼而知己，一胜一负；不知彼不知己，每战必殆。). I can’t help but feeling the full force of this quote as I, along with the rest of the world, watch incredulously as America flails helplessly while China is coasting along with an assurance not seen since British ambassador Macartney met with the Qianlong Emperor in 1793.
